Title: Face Changes
Description: Face Changer is a fun puzzle game in which you have to correctly put together different faces in order to move to the next level or achieve new and better results in the training mode.
Instructions:
PC: Left Mous Click on part of face to change it.
Mobile: Touch Screen on part of face to change it.

Title: Crime Theft Gangster Paradise
Description: Crime Theft Gangster Paradise is an action-packed gaming experience set in the neon-lit streets of Las Vegas. Players become ruthless gangsters, armed with a vast array of weapons. Engage in intense shootouts while collecting valuable loot
Instructions: use mouse to play

Title: Brainstorming 2D
Description: Brainstorming 2D is a puzzle game. In each slider puzzle, you will see a grid with colored grid edges with squares inside these borders. The squares are the same color as the grid edges. The number of colors may vary. Each slider puzzle aims to get rid of all blocks locked within the edges of the grid.
Instructions: Slide to move

Title: Crystal Connect
Description: Discover the enchanting world of Crystal Connect, a captivating game with breathtaking graphics! Join a pair of dwarves on an epic quest to collect precious crystals and navigate through dozens of challenging levels in this immersive connect-style adventure game. Connect pairs of gems, create powerful combinations and pave your way to victory. Dive into the adventure today and discover the magic of Crystal Connect
Instructions: The goal of the game is to clear the playing field of all crystals by connecting them in pairs. But there is one important condition: the path between two tiles must have no more than two bends. Diverse obstacles and explosive gems ramp up the complexity, ensuring every game is filled with surprises and excitement.

Title: Scary Baby Yellow Game
Description:
You have a new babysitting job, and things are becoming odd. Feed him, give him a bedtime tale, and avoid falling into his nightmares about him. How long can you maintain control?

Try to care for a weird infant in a lonely and unusual residence. Look for the baby in each area and follow the directions to reach your objective and finish the level.
Instructions:
Don't lose control because you're afraid of this home; instead, proceed through the rooms and attempt to rescue the baby and care for him, who is terrified and will not stop sobbing until he finds you.

Instructions :
"WASD" Walk
"shift Left" Run
"SPACE" Jump
"ESC" Menu
"F" interact

Title: Nose Hospital
Description: In Nose Hospital Games, The patients are counting on you in this nose surgery hospital game. Will you rise to the occasion and become the hero in plastic surgery games, they desperately need? Step into the operating theater and redefine the world of nose plastic surgery games.
Instructions: Cure your way through the quirkiest and funniest diseases in Nose Hospital

Title: Idle Trade Isle
Description: Idle Trade Isle is a casual simulation game. Let's go on an island adventure on the sea! You are a captain, driving a boat to the mysterious island group. Each island has different natural resources that need to be collected. After collecting them, go back to your own island to build and upgrade them.  Enjoy!
Instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

Title: Mine & Slash
Description:
Embark on an epic RPG quest, as you dig and explore your way through a rougelite 3D world filled with magic and adventure.

Features:
- Explore multiple mines
- Upgrade your equipment to get more deadly and effective
- Fight and defeat imposing bosses
- Discover new content and surprises in many upcoming updates

As a miner, you have the unique opportunity to collect gold and valuable resources as you dig deeper and deeper into the dungeon. Unlock powerful skills to become even stronger!
Instructions: Click and drag to control the character. Attacking and minig is automatic.

Title: The Branch Runner
Description: Are you good at endless running arcade games? Here is a chance for you to play a funny running arcade game with 3D pixel blocks. You need to help the character run forward by means of rotating the platform track and avoiding the obstacle blocks. There are many beautiful skins in the shop. As long as you earned enough gold coins, you could unlock and use them!
Instructions: Tap the left side of the screen to rotate left, tap the right side of the screen to rotate right

Title: Ghost Escape 3D
Description: You are locked in a hospital that seems to be HAUNTED. Now you have to try to get out of the hospital, but you can only get out after you collect all the posters/pictures, but be careful and quiet, GHOST hears everything.
Instructions:
WASD - MOVE
E - Interact/Pickup in-game elements
Mouse - Look Around
L - Lock/Unlock Cursor
H - Hint
X - Map

Title: Riders Downhill Racing
Description: Get ready to join the riders in an exciting adventure with Riders Downhill Racing! Choose from various game modes, including free ride, race, and career, available in both 1 player and 2 player modes. Experience the thrill of riding different vehicles, such as ATV bikes, cross bikes, and speed boats, while wearing different costumes. Join any mode and have a blast! Remember to collect diamonds during the free ride to unlock more items.
Instructions:
Player 1:
Move: "W, A, S, D" or "ARROW KEYS" (1P Mode Only)
Jump: "Q"
Parachute: "Z"
Nitro: "SHIFT"
Switch Vehicle: "TAB"
Camera: "C"
Restart: "R"

Player 2:
Move: "ARROW KEYS"
Jump: "K"
Parachute: "P"
Nitro: "M"
Select: "ENTER"
Camera: "K"
Restart: "L"

Title: Daily Horoscope HD
Description: Daily Horoscope HD offers personalized daily horoscopes at your fingertips. Click on your zodiac sign to uncover insights into your day, with the option to watch an ad for access to other sign readings.
Instructions: Unlock daily insights by simply clicking on your zodiac sign.

Title: Tail Gun Charlie
Description: Tail Gun Charlie: An Epic War Simulator. Experience the thrill of flying an airplane in Tail Gun Charlie, the ultimate war simulator! Complete challenging missions and blast your enemies out of the sky! Use flexible controls to master the air combat! Are you ready for the adventure? Download Tail Gun Charlie now and have fun!
Instructions: WASD = move

Title: Jet Fighter Airplane Racing
Description:
Are you a fan of car traffic games & street racing? Do you like planes and the sky? We have something new to play! Try a plane flying game with different missions, improve your flying skills and become a true professional in racing piloting in Jet Fighter Airplane Racing!

Are you looking for exclusive aeroplanes?
• MiG-21 “Fishbed"
• McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II
• MiG-29 “Fulcrum”
• F-16 Fighting Falcon
• MiG-31 BM “Foxhound”
• F-22 Raptor
• SU-35 “Flanker-E”
• SU-47 "Firkin"
• SU-57
Instructions:
Jet Movement: WASD 
Machine Gun: Space 
Missile: Shift 
Speed Up: ↑
Slow Down: ↓ 
Barrel Roll: Q 
Inside Loop: E 
Heat Traps: R

Multiple modes are waiting for you! Air combat with airplanes, aviation traffic, pursuit of the plane and other armed forces games to discover. Moreover, colorful landscapes are here to make the airplane traffic racer gameplay even better.

Title: Cut Grass
Description: Do you know powerful a ring blade is? Cut Grass will show you a famous Mexican weapon in a 3D collecting puzzle arcade game. Here is some weed on the mud, your mission is to cut them all down at all levels. Without time and score limitations, keep calm and have a good time!
Instructions: Slide to move

Title: Countryside Truck Drive
Description: Embark on a picturesque journey in Countryside Truck Driving, where you'll navigate your transport truck through a charming countryside town, with stunning ice-capped mountain ranges as your backdrop; collect coins, dodge roadblocks, and test your skills to achieve the highest score.
Instructions: Experience the serene beauty of the countryside as you drive your transport truck through a scenic town in Countryside Truck Driving, collecting coins and dodging roadblocks to achieve the highest score.

Title: Bubble Shooter HD 3
Description: Bubble Shooter HD 3 is the long-awaited third sequel to the the legendary Bubble Shooter game. Bubble Shooter HD 3 features the classic Bubble Shooter HD gameplay with a set of fresh new bubbles, the option to choose between the arrow vs pointer when shooting bubbles as well as the mighty BOMB feature that lets you blow up 15 bubbles at once. So what is the highest score you can achieve? Enjoy Bubble Shooter HD 3 now and break a new record!
Instructions: Pop all bubbles on the board, scoring as many points as possible. Use the mouse or your finger to aim and shoot. Pop two or more bubbles with a bubble of the same color. The more bubbles you pop in one shot, the more points you get. Failing to pop any bubbles will earn you a foul. After several fouls, a new line of bubbles will be added to the board as a penalty. Use the BOMB to pop 15 bubbles at the same time! Try new winning strategies and become a master!

Title: Blue Girls Makeup
Description: Experience the beauty world like never before with our Blue Girls Makeup game. It's time to unravel your creative side and weave makeup wizardry! This game allows you to dip your brush into a palette of possibilities, from stunning eyeshadow shades to gorgeous lipstick hues. Play it today and get the chance to experiment with different makeup techniques and spark your imagination. The Blue Girls Makeup game brings fun and fashion right at your fingertips. Dive in now!
Instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on a desktop or tap to play on mobile devices.

Title: Offroad Island
Description: "Offroad Island" is an exciting racing game where you compete with different vehicles, earn money by completing missions, and customize your vehicles by upgrading them. Each map offers an adventure full of challenges. Are you ready for a journey full of speed and excitement?
Instructions: Movement: WASD or arrow keys

Title: Horse Champs
Description: Raise, train, and compete with your champion horse to secure first place in this thrilling horse racing simulation game. Strategize and master the art of competition.
Instructions:
- Use taps or mouse to assign workouts
- Train your horse

Title: Hero Wizard: Save Your Girlfriend
Description: One day when I woke up, I saw that my girlfriend wasn't beside me, so I started searching around for her but couldn't find her. Then I noticed a letter on the table, and the letter said: "If you want to see your girlfriend again, you'll have to pass through the magic forest to rescue her, but it won't be easy because you're not alone in the forest!" At first, I didn't understand, but..
Instructions:
Magic: Left Click
Super Magic: Hold Right Click
Move: W-A-S-D or Arrow Keys
Power: Hold Left Shift
Health Regeneration: H

Title: Sheep Sheep Duck
Description: Sheep Sheep Duck is a very novel casual multiplayer party interactive game. You are free to choose and match the battle scenarios to your liking. The game has all kinds of cool scenes. You can control the game character flexibly by tapping directly on the screen, and take more challenges here. Show off your ability to defeat more enemies in this game, so you can get more weapons. You can challenge yourself better with great strength, so you can unlock new game maps.
Instructions: On PC = WASD and HJK to move and attack. On Mobile = Finger clicks the buttons to move and attack.

Title: Amazing Airplane Racer
Description: Amazing Airplane Racer revolutionizes the airborne gaming experience by combining high-speed plane racing with strategic special skills. Maneuver through challenging tracks while collecting power-ups like turbo boosts and shields to outsmart opponents. With stunning graphics and intense multiplayer action, the game delivers an adrenaline-packed aerial competition where skill and strategy take center stage. Are you ready to dominate the skies and become the ultimate airborne champion?
Instructions:
Player 1: Move: ARROW KEYS
Player 2: Move: WASD

Title: Monster Vs Zombie
Description: Slide the monster to help it eat all the zombies in the way. Use your strategic thinking and problem solving skill to avoid all obstacle and reach the gate to go to the next level.
Instructions: Slide the monster. The monster will keep going until it hits the wall or an obstacle. Move it in a different direction until it finishes all the target.

Title: Eye Attack - Toilet Monster War
Description:
Help Secret Agent to survive in Toilet War! Solve puzzles and prevent toilet invasion in our world!

Every single level in Eye Attack: Toilet Monster War is an unique challenge that will train your logic and shooting skills. Only the smartest players can solve all the puzzles and destroy all the Toilet Monsters on the level. Try to get three stars on each level! Can you?

Try this Trending Toilet Monster game and join the fight against the Toilet Monsters!
Instructions: Mouse control. Click to aim. Release to shoot

Title: Skibidi Toilet vs Cameraman Sniper Game
Description: Camera man are trying to survive in toilet mans red light green light game. If there is a camera man moving when the toilet man says red light, you must destroy him with your sniper gun. When aiming, you have to make sure you hit the right player. If you shoot the correct player, you earn additional points. Compete with your friends by getting the highest score. Play Toilet vs Cameraman Sniper now!
Instructions:
Mouse lock/unlock = L,    
Sniper moves = Mouse,    
Zoom = Right click,    
Fire = Left click,    
Zoom in/out = Mouse Wheel

Title: Stunt Car Extreme 2
Description: Experience the exhilarating thrill of Stunt automobile Extreme 2, a remarkable 3D game that offers free access. Engage in extreme automobile driving on very challenging courses, which include moving platforms suspended in the sky. Navigate over intense obstacles and sharp bends to test your skills to the limit.
Instructions: By successfully completing all stages, you will earn money that may be used to purchase further cars. The game's requirements stipulate that you must achieve the objective within a certain timeframe.

Title: Death Ball
Description: The bouncer as we see him! Swing hard and throw the ball! Let the tables and the people fly! It's time for some wild and smashing fun!
Instructions: - Use WASD and mouse to attack other players

Title: Dynamons 7
Description:
Embark on a brand new Dynamons adventure in Dynamons 7! This online monster collecting game includes two fresh areas to explore; Tall Pines world and the bonus cave.

Seasoned Dynamons connoisseur Jovani will tell you everything you need to know to become a true Dynamon Captain. Encounter Crocynos, Huango, Cybeenyx, Aragonyx and many more special Dynamons. Recruit them for your team and beat others in thrilling 1v1 battles with special attacks and power-ups.
Instructions:
Play the game using touchscreen controls or your mouse.

The game consists of spellbinding turn-based battles. You can use the action cards to attack, and catch the opposing creature when it’s weakened. The backpack is filled with items you can collect and use during your journeys. By selecting it during battle, you can access these special items. Use shards to level up your Dynamons, and to gain new action cards. Challenge other trainers and become the strongest Dynamon Captain!

Title: Anaconda Runner
Description: Anaconda Runner is a casual arcade game. In the snake kingdom, size is a status symbol. The bigger you are, the more powerful you are and the higher your status. So how do you increase your size?  There is a runway in front of you. There are many blue balls on the runway that can help you grow. See how far you can go, have fun!
Instructions: Slide to move

Title: Hero Pipe
Description: The hero began his journey for treasure and to save the princess, but the puzzles in front of the hunter trapped him. What you need to do is to connect the pipes in the right order, so that the hero can take the hidden treasure and save the princess away from the dragons, wolves and monsters safely.
Instructions: Solve puzzles and rescue the hero, collect all the treasures, kill monsters and save the princess. Connect the pipes in order to destroy your enemies by pulling lava and poisonous gas into their puzzle units.

Title: Colors Runners
Description: Colors Runners is an interesting game that you can not miss. Slide to gather your companions of the same color and rush to the finishing line. Remember to walk the same way as your body color or you will get shot and fail. Challenge this game now!
Instructions: Tap to play

Title: Seafaring Memory Challenge
Description: Set sail into the captivating depths of the ocean with Seafaring Memory Challenge! Match pairs of sea-themed icons in an endless array of levels. Test your memory skills as you uncover treasures like colorful fish, delicate sea shells, and sunken treasures. With no level limit, the adventure never ends, providing hours of entertainment. Stay sharp and immerse yourself in the mesmerizing world beneath the waves!
Instructions: Simply tap or click on two cards to reveal them. If they match, they stay open. If not, they flip back over. Keep matching until all pairs are found!

Title: Madness Driver Vertigo City
Description: Mad drivers meet in the vertigo city with their cool super sport racing cars. The city offers a plethora of exciting activities and races. Fly through the ramps and collect gems to double your fun. Enjoy amusement park activities and play single or 2 player mode to challenge your friend in races or free drive activities. Begin the supercar simulator and customize your cars with unique designs.
Instructions:
Player 1:
Move: "W, A, S, D" or "ARROW KEYS" (1P Mode)
Nitro: "L-SHIFT"
Restart: "R"
Look back: T"

Player 2:
Move: "ARROW KEYS"
Nitro: "R-SHIFT"
Restart: "O"
Look back: "P"

Title: Pop Adventure
Description: Welcome to Pop Adventure, an addictive bubble shooter game that offers endless entertainment and relaxation to players of all ages. Match 3 balls to explode and clear all bubbles on the screen to complete the mission and win rewards
Instructions: Match 3 balls to explode and clear all bubbles on the screen to complete the mission and win rewards

Title: Pocket Car Master
Description:
Pocket Car Master: The Ultimate Car Puzzle Game
Collect and merge parts to make your own robot car. Park it in the matching area and fight other robots. No time limit, just fun. Upgrade your car with coins and unlock more cars. Try and play now!
Instructions: Drag a line to park the car, tap or hold to exit

Title: Color Sort Mania
Description: Forget about everyday life and indulge in a simple world where sorting is an art. Put the bubbles in the most strategic flask and enjoy when everything falls into place.
Instructions: Click on the flasks you want to move the bubbles on top between them. Make sure all bubbles of the same color are in one flask to pass the level. Use the power-ups in case you get stuck or don't know how to proceed.

Title: Racing Island
Description: Explore, race and prove your mastery! Go on an adventurous journey with unique vehicles. Show off your skills in race, freeride and stand modes. Each level is full of new vehicles and discoveries. Are you ready for leadership?
Instructions:
Movement: WASD or arrow keys.
Increase speed: W or up arrow.
Control the car: A/D or left/right arrows.
Brake: S or down OK
Nitro: Shift

Title: Hoard Master
Description: Hoard Master is a game to test your speed and responsiveness. Your goal is to collect more and more people, but you should prevent the income of explosives to avoid failure. Are you interested?
Instructions: Slide to move

Title: Mini Springs
Description: Mini Springs is a retro-style platform game where you command a small blob character that can't jump; use the springs all over the stage to evade obstacles and reach your goal!
Instructions:
Mobile:
-Touch Right to Move Right.
-Touch Left to Move Left.
Desktop:
-AD or Arrow Keys to Move.
